channel.title: Synthesizer/Keyboard Thread
channel.description:
I'm a synthesizer junkie. Every 6-8 months I get an uncontrollable urge to buy a synthesizer, which will not be used for any useful purpose unless it's to be resold to finance further electronic music gear.
Right now I'm fighting the urge to purchase a [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=haEamoaZePw&feature=related']Korg DW8000[/url]. This thread is to either convince me to do it, talk me out of it, or discuss your own synth obsessions if applicable. Analog vs. Digital debate is also acceptable. Personally I think digital synths will never (thats right, never!) 100% reproduce the sound of a quality analog machine.

item.title: Synthesizer/Keyboard Thread
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
I’m a synthesizer junkie. Every 6-8 months I get an uncontrollable urge to buy a synthesizer, which will not be used for any useful purpose unless it’s to be resold to finance further electronic music gear.

Right now I’m fighting the urge to purchase a Korg DW8000.
This thread is to either convince me to do it, talk me out of it, or discuss your own synth obsessions if applicable. Analog vs. Digital debate is also acceptable. Personally I think digital synths will never (thats right, never!) 100% reproduce the sound of a quality analog machine.
